name: Star Wars Galaxies: Trials of Obi-Wan
name_original: Star Wars Galaxies: Trials of Obi-Wan
description:
Star Wars Galaxies: Trials of Obi-Wan is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by Sony Online Entertainment. It was originally released in 2005. LucasArts Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Star Wars Galaxies: Trials of Obi-Wan on PC.
